# Projet Analyse Syntaxique

## Compile :
```
cd src ; make && make latex
```

## To clean all generated files :
```
cd src ; make clean
```

## Usage :
```
cd src ; ../bin/doc_html folder/file1.h src/file2.h ... fileN.h file1.c file2.c ... fileN.c
cd src : ../bin/rapport_html folder/file.tex
```

Open src/output/index.html to see the result

To view an example of the program, you can run src/script.sh and see the results of the parsing on our files. (open src/output/index.html in your favorite web browser)
